metamodel.description:
Check this to generate form models on leading frameworks.
This Form Metamodel allows to model Web Forms to integrate in your web application or web framework customizations.
S-IDE provides the modeler to graphically produce form models and various generators to instantiate these models on leading frameworks.
metamodel.name: KSR400 Form

technology.description:
Check this to generate your form models on a XForms engine.
XForms is a standard to describe the structure of web forms using precise semantics and separation of concern.
S-IDE allows to optimize the production of XForms-based web forms through graphical design, automatic generation, data integration and Xforms-based engine deployment.
technology.name: Xforms

technologyVersion.description:
Check this to generate your form models on the major release 1.5 of the XForms-based Chiba engine.
Chiba 1.5.x is the leading open source Xforms engine solution.
S-IDE allows to generate the XForms templates and this generation has been heavily qualified on Chiba.

generatorVersion.description:
Check this to generate a full deployable Chiba package containing the newly designed web forms.
The generated packages are standard WAR files which may be deployed in any Chiba 1.5.x instance under the 'webapp' web application server directory.
S-IDE provides the necessary components to deploy these packages through the 'deployer' tab, including the data controller to access data through generated web forms.
